remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于此委托回调所使用的特定签名和相关方法，如只读的等效项。Callbacks based on this delegate are used by certain signatures of and related methods, such as and read-only equivalents. 应使用需要的签名`validateValueCallback`参数，如果你想设置其有效每次属性值的特定验证。You should use signatures that take the `validateValueCallback` parameter if you want specific validation of the property value each time that its effective is set. 然后，以便它执行实际验证的建议的值，应实现此回调。You should then implement this callback such that it performs the actual validation of the proposed value. 应返回回调`true`提交给回调的值是否有效，和`false`否则为。The callback should return `true` if the value submitted to the callback is valid, and `false` otherwise. A`false`的值将产生无效的属性集尝试属性系统的特定部分中出现异常，因此你的应用程序应准备好处理这些异常。A `false` value will produce an exception in the specific portion of the property system where the invalid property set was attempted, so your application should be prepared to handle these exceptions. 验证回调存储在依赖项属性标识符，而不是依赖属性元数据。Validation callbacks are stored on dependency property identifiers, rather than dependency property metadata. 验证回调不具有访问特定实例的权限上属性的设置，并且可以仅影响属性通常接受哪些值。Your validation callback does not have access to a specific instance of a on which the property is set, and can only influence what values are accepted for the property in general. 如果需要可以更改基于特定实例的属性值的回调，则应使用的组合和回调应用到你的属性的属性元数据。If you need a callback that can change property values based on a specific instance, you should use a combination of a and callbacks as applied to the property metadata of your property. 你也可能适用于应影响属性的值的相关属性的这些回调。You might also apply these callbacks to related properties that should influence your property's value. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性的回调和验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。For details, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md). ## Examples 下面的示例包括用于验证自定义的依赖项属性的值范围此回调的实现。The following example includes an implementation of this callback to validate a range of values for a custom dependency property. 在这种情况下，属性值应枚举，并且验证可确保提供的值计算为该枚举的成员。In this case the property value expects an enumeration, and the validation assures that the provided value evaluates to a member of that enumeration.
